mapper.insert: INSERT INTO refunds (user_id, order_id, reason, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{order.id}, #{reason}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE refunds SET reason = #{reason}, status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.reason, r.status, r.created_at, r.updated_at, r.user_id, u.name as user_name, u.email as user_email, r.order_id, o.total_amount as order_total_amount FROM refunds r LEFT JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN orders o ON r.order_id = o.id WHERE r.id = #{id}
